title: Tales From The Borderlands (Episode 3) (GOG)
description:
== About the game:
Episode 3: 'Catch a Ride' 
After a dizzying escape from a very-near-almost-certain-death scenario (involving statuesque buttocks), Rhys and Fiona find themselves looking for another piece of the puzzle that will lead them to the untold riches of Vault key ownership. Lost in the mysterious jungle of an Atlas terraforming facility, Fiona finds help from an unexpected mentor, Rhys continues to share brain-space with the disembodied mind of a dead dictator, and love is in the air. Pursued by the ruthless criminal 'Queenpin' Vallory, and with very little help from Vaughn's accountancy skills (or stellar abs), getting anywhere near the Vault will be entirely up to you. 

If you already own the game, this content upgrade is absolutely free. If you don't, it'll be on a 30% discount for 48 hours - until Thursday, June 25th at 4pm GMT (thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 6pm CET / 12pm EDT / 9am PDT).


== Version:
Episode 3 Update from June 23, 2015. Requires Episodes 1+2 already installed GOG version


== Instructions:
Run patch and Update 
Play - Enjoy - Seed!


== System Requirements:
Minimum:
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
Video card: ATI or NVIDIA card w/512 MB RAM
Operating system: Windows XP SP3 
System memory: 3 GB RAM 
Hard disk drive: 3 GB



           If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding
                       Remember to support quality games
